name: KeepShopKeeping 2 (itch)
description:
INCREMENTAL RPG GAME WITH A VERY SMALL LORE!

KSK2

KSK was my first game ever made and its launch was a real disaster... I had never made a game before making KSK.... So yes at the time it got a lot of hate...

KSK2 However has proved to be somewhat of a special launch since .. I already had tons of previous experience with the engine .... and Its launch wasnt so bad...

I am recovering KSK2 because I believe this game had potential... I mean It definetly doesnt have same quality of my most modern GAMES.... but well it still proven to break a lot of barriers for me...

KSK2 introduces fishing mechanic as well as crafting.... and as always in this game you will be fighting the same battles over and over again hiting "Enter" lots of times...

while unlocking new content and progress...

KSK2 is a game that made me really proud at the time...

KSK however I no longer have the files of that game... You can still play KSK2 since you dont need to know anything of the first game in order to play the second game...

  • Active Battle system("Enter" spamming)
  • Incremental progression
  • Crafting
  • Shoping
  • Cute Recipes
  • Funny non important lore =)

Have Fun!
